mapper.select: select (select code_val from t_hana_code_table where code_key = type and code_category = 1) as type, account_no, product_name, balance, withdrawable_balance, password, dormant, lost, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, to_char(recently_use_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as recentlyUseDate from T_HANA_ACCOUNT where reg_no = (select reg_no from t_hana_user where reg_no = #{regNo}) order by recentlyUseDate desc
mapper.update: update T_HANA_ACCOUNT set password=#{password} where account_no = ${accountNo}
update T_HANA_ACCOUNT set lost='T' where account_no = ${accountNo}
update T_HANA_ACCOUNT set lost='F' where account_no = ${accountNo}
